title: What will it take to boost women’s representation in tech? Here’s what leaders had to say at Future of Work 20 - YourStory
content: What will it take to boost women’s representation in tech? Here’s what leaders had to say at Future of Work 20  YourStory
description: On day 1 of the Future of Work 2022 conference, women leaders delved into the key gaps and challenges in the sector, and highlighted the way ahead to accelerate women’s careers in tech.
